title: Before and After Gallery
longDescription:
**About** If you want to compare two pictures in the real world you will place them side by side. But in digital there’s a better way to do it, and that is by overlap. This technique allows you to spot the smallest differences between two items. It also tells a better story by comparing an original product, with an enhanced version of it. For example you might use our app to compare the skin of a client before and after they use a treatment that you sell. Or you might use it to show work you did on a house renovation.
**Standard Features** * Use an existing layout or create a new one. * Top customer support.
author: Widgetic

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: The Free plan makes it easy to try our app and explore its benefits before upgrading.
products.longDescription:
**Standard Features:**

- Use an existing layout or create a new one.
- Top customer support.

products.title: Premium
products.shortDescription: The Premium plan removes all the constraints when customizing the layout and hides our branding.
products.longDescription:
**All Standard Features plus:**

- **No Branding** - _our Widgetic branding is removed_
- **Slide Direction** - _set the direction of the slide (vertical or horizontal)_
- **Slide Type** - _choose what interaction moves the slider (hover or drag)_
- **Initial Slider Position** - _set the initial position of the slider in percents_
- **Scrub Icon** - _select an icon between bars and arrows_
- **Scrub Position** - _move the scrub in the center or any position on the slider_
- **Toggle Navigator** - _set the navigator’s visibility_
- **Navigator Position** - _position the navigator to the top or bottom_
- **Auto Hide Navigator** - _tell the navigator to slide out on mouse-out_

FIX: When removing both images, there shouldn't still be one that is shown.
FIX: resize mode

proposedApp.title: Before and After Gallery
proposedApp.longDescription:
**About** If you want to compare two pictures in the real world you will place them side by side. But in digital there’s a better way to do it, and that is by overlap. This technique allows you to spot the smallest differences between two items. It also tells a better story by comparing an original product, with an enhanced version of it. For example you might use our app to compare the skin of a client before and after they use a treatment that you sell. Or you might use it to show work you did on a house renovation.
**Standard Features** * Use an existing layout or create a new one. * Top customer support.
proposedApp.author: Widgetic

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: The Free plan makes it easy to try our app and explore its benefits before upgrading.
products.longDescription:
**Standard Features:**

- Use an existing layout or create a new one.
- Top customer support.

products.title: Premium
products.shortDescription: The Premium plan removes all the constraints when customizing the layout and hides our branding.
products.longDescription:
**All Standard Features plus:**

- **No Branding** - _our Widgetic branding is removed_
- **Slide Direction** - _set the direction of the slide (vertical or horizontal)_
- **Slide Type** - _choose what interaction moves the slider (hover or drag)_
- **Initial Slider Position** - _set the initial position of the slider in percents_
- **Scrub Icon** - _select an icon between bars and arrows_
- **Scrub Position** - _move the scrub in the center or any position on the slider_
- **Toggle Navigator** - _set the navigator’s visibility_
- **Navigator Position** - _position the navigator to the top or bottom_
- **Auto Hide Navigator** - _tell the navigator to slide out on mouse-out_
